channel.title: 3DPrinting on Peter's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in 3DPrinting on Peter's Notebook

item.title: 3D Printing Log
item.description:
This is a rough (and uneditied) log of my 3D printing attempts. I’m posting it mainly as I see no harm in that, rather than a believe that my poorly written scribbling with be of greate sorcial benefit.

(The spelling mistakes above are as intentional here as they are in 419 scams)

item.title: PrinterJournal / Bowden Tube Flush with Nozzle
item.description: My 3D printer was in a state where it seemed to need the nozzle unclogged after each print. The issue was that the PTFE tube was not flush with the nozzle, due to the hot end coupler being “worn in” and feeling like it was fully extended.
